# Draft:List of hardware by Apple, Inc.

This list of hardware by Apple, Inc. covers hardware designed by Apple Inc., organised by category.
Macintosh
Motorola 68000 (1984-1994)
PowerPC (1994-2006)
Intel (2006-2021)
Apple Silicon (2020-present)
iPhone
* iPhone (first generation)
* iPhone 3G
* iPhone 3Gs
iPod
iPod (classic)
iPod Touch
iPod Nano
iPod Shuffle
iPod Mini
iPad
iPad
iPad Mini
iPad Air
iPad Pro
Apple Watch
AirPods
Vision Pro
Accessories
Notes
References
